meanings.definition: Plural of 'uva', meaning grape in Spanish.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on juicy uvas in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on uvas, so I bought a bunch.
meanings.sent3: The uvas at the picnic were so popular, they disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a bunch of uvas bursting with flavor.
meanings.sent5: The vineyard was a sea of uvas, ripe and ready for harvest.
